The Governor of Tamil Nadu having been satisfied that the lands specified in the Schedule below have to be acquired for the Highways purpose of strengthening and widening of SH-40 Tiruchendur-Ambasamudram via Palayamkottai Road at (from km of 0/750 to 54/000 and from km 29/150 to 32/900) in certain Villages in Thoothukudi and Tirunelveli District and it has already been decided that the entire amount of compensation to be awarded for the lands is to be paid out of the funds controlled or managed by the Divisional Engineer (H), Chennai Kanyakumari Industrial Corridor Project, Tirunelveli after considering the cause shown by the owner (or) other person having interest on such lands as the case may be do hereby publish the following notice under sub-section

NOTICE
Under sub-section (1) of Section 15 of the Tamil Nadu Highways Act, 2001 (Tamil Nadu Act 34 of 2002) the Governor of Tamil Nadu hereby acquires the land specified in the Schedule below measuring to an extent of 64966 sq.mts of Dry/Wet lands in Srivaikuntam Part-Il Village, Srivaikuntam Taluk, Thoothukudi District for the purpose of wit for Widening of SH-40 Tiruchendur-Ambasamudram via Palayamkottai Road at (from km of 0/750 to 54/000 and from km 29/150 to 32/900).
The plan of the lands are kept in the office of the Special District Revenue Officer (Land Acquisition), and office of the Special Tahsildar (Land Acquisition), Chennai Kanyakumari Industrial Corridor Project, Tirunelveli, may be inspected at any time during office hours.
